name: First day at work
description:
You just got hired by a company to repair their power facility. The problem is, you don't know how anything works. Explore your environment to find out !

This prototype was developed using an hybrid interface made with a Makey Makey (a device that allows you to use everyday objects as controllers). We crafted a controller specifically for the game during the jam... using a coffee pack and spoons !

On a normal keyboard, the game plays using only directionnal arrows and the spacebar. Each input has a specific role.

See pictures for more information.

Developpers : Alex Baret and Ali Bayahi
Graphists : Louis Varon, Estelle Garcia and Esteban Legrand
Game Designer : Félix Moll and Esteban Legrand
Ergonomics : Félix Moll
Composer : Paul Mossy
Sound Designer : Quentin Las

Game made in 48H for the Perpignan Game Jam
